alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 18 at 3:21PM PST until November 19 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Stevens Pass. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Motorists should be prepared for winter driving conditions on Highway 2 near Stevens Pass. Accumulating snow will also occur at Washington Pass on the North Cascades Highway.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
